page.title: 03 LOCAL POLITICS
page.content: Politicians are people chosen to make decisions for their community, and also help to run the country. Local decisions are taken by 2 groups- {The District and Regional Councils.} These are responsible for providing services to the area such as refuse collection,education,water,sewage etc. All the main parties are active in the area,but the Labour Party has most support,and controls both councils. Kilsyth was once a mining town and this explains the strength of this party. In our block ,there are also 2 { {Community Councils}-Queenzieburn and Kilsyth.These have no statutary powers,but are vehicles for expressing local views,and taking local action. {TOM BARRIE }is our local{M.P.}and represents{LABOUR.}
